revision.text: Possibly: A Vindication of the Christian Religion. In two parts. I. A Discourse of the Nature and Use of Miracles. II. An Answer to a late Book entitled, A Discourse of the Grounds and Reasons of the Christian Religion. By Samuel Chandler. 2nd ed. (London : Printed for S. Chandler, at the Cross-Keys in the Poultry, MDCCXXVIII. [1728]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2409571~S1
